name: Future Flyers of Iowa
about: Future Flyers of Iowa, located at the Winterset Municipal Airport in central Iowa, offers comprehensive flight training programs for Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Commercial Pilot licenses. Using a fleet of modern aircraft, including Cessna 172, Cessna 150, Liberty XL2, and a Seneca I for multi-engine training, all equipped with the latest avionics and GPS instruments. We pride ourselves on providing quality instruction at an affordable price, with a personalized approach to meet each student's needs. Our veteran-owned business also offers aircraft rental, aerial photography, ground instruction, and other aviation services. Contact us to schedule a discovery flight or a personalized tour to discuss our training programs in depth. We are committed to helping you achieve your flying goals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
